apiKey.description: simpler configuration, but requires spreadsheets to be public.
apiKey.label: API Key

gce.description: automatically retrieves default credentials. Requires Grafana to be running on a Google Compute Engine virtual machine.
gce.label: GCE Default Service Account

authType.instructions: Select an Authentication type below and expand Configure Google Sheets Authentication for detailed guidance on configuration

jwt.description: provides access to private spreadsheets and works in all environments where Grafana is running.
jwt.label: Google JWT File

authType.title: Choosing an authentication type
